description.en: BuzzFeed, Inc. is an American Internet media, news and entertainment company with a focus on digital media; it is based in New York City. BuzzFeed was founded in 2006 by Jonah Peretti and John S. Johnson III, to focus on tracking viral content.
description.tr: BuzzFeed, Inc. dijital medyaya odaklanan bir Amerikan İnternet medyası, haber ve eğlence şirketidir; New York'ta dayanmaktadır. BuzzFeed, 2006 yılında Jonah Peretti ve John S. Johnson III tarafından viral içeriklerin izlenmesine odaklanmak üzere kuruldu.
description.nl: BuzzFeed, Inc. is een Amerikaans internetmedia-, nieuws- en entertainmentbedrijf met een focus op digitale media; het is gevestigd in New York City. BuzzFeed is in 2006 opgericht door Jonah Peretti en John S. Johnson III, om zich te concentreren op het volgen van virale inhoud.
